about_the_game:
Behind Glass is the ultimate fish-keeping game, designed to deliver a relaxing yet deeply engaging experience for aquarium enthusiasts and casual players alike.

Whether you’re a passionate aquascaper or simply enjoy the calming beauty of underwater worlds, this game offers everything you need to create your dream aquarium.

Explore a vast sandbox environment where you can design stunning 3D aquariums with incredible creative freedom. Choose between freshwater and saltwater tanks, each offering unique challenges and opportunities to showcase your style. With access to over 200 unique fish species, along with crabs, turtles, and axolotls, your tanks will be bursting with life.

Behind Glass stands apart with its immersive water chemistry simulation, allowing players to delve into the science behind aquarium care. Adjust pH, salinity, and other parameters to create the perfect conditions for your aquatic friends. For those who prefer a more relaxed approach, the sandbox mode offers the freedom to focus on design and aesthetics without any constraints.

Forget about grinding or locked content — everything is available right from the start. From vibrant fish to countless decorations, you’ll have every tool at your disposal to craft aquariums that reflect your imagination.

Dive deep into the game’s features:

  • Instant access to a vast array of decorations, plants, and creatures.

  • Detailed animations and realistic behaviors for fish and aquatic animals.

  • The ability to mix and match species in diverse habitats.

  • A meditative, stress-free atmosphere designed for relaxation.

  • No other fish tank simulation comes close to offering this level of depth and creativity. Whether you’re a beginner or an experienced aquascaper, Behind Glass lets you build, customize, and manage stunning aquariums without limits.

Start your aquascaping journey today and transform your virtual tanks into mesmerizing underwater worlds!
